headline: Bernstein Initiates Coverage of Expand Energy (EXE)
summary: It was recently reported that analysts at Bernstein have initiated coverage of Expand Energy Corporation (NASDAQ:EXE). Let’s shed some light on the development. Formed in 2024 by the merger of Chesapeake Energy Corporation and Southwestern Energy Company, Expand Energy Corporation (NASDAQ:EXE) is the largest natural gas producer in America. The company is focused on responsibly […]
